snippet.title: The top 10 sci-fi horror films of all time
snippet.description: Five years after debuting its top five sci-fi horror flicks, Geekend returns with an amended and extended top 10 catalog of science-fiction scarefests.

snippet.title: October 2012 Geekend movie rundown
snippet.description: The seven sci-fi, fantasy, horror, and generally geek-related flicks that will hit U.S. cinemas in October of 2012.
